Package io.elegie.luchess.app.lucene4x.index.manager

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FSIndexManager
    A manager providing a FSDirectory directory.
    IndexManager
    Utility methods to manage the index.
    RAMIndexManager
    A manager providing a RAMDirectory directory.
    ReaderTemplate<T>
    This class lets us encapsulate a read in the index, managing the lifecycle of reader accesses.
    ReaderTemplate.ReaderTemplateArg
    Wrapper for reader-related objects.
    WriterTemplate
    This class lets us encapsulate a write in the index, managing the lifecycle of writer accesses.
    WriterTemplate.CleanUp
    Implementations of the template should make sure that the clean up method be called once they have finished processing their domain logic.
